name: MISP Exporter - Custom
author: Nick Driver (@TheDr1ver)
description: Export custom fields from TheHive to MISP the way we want them without recompiling from source.

configurationItems.name: misp_url
configurationItems.description: URL to your MISP instance (e.g. https://misp.example.com

configurationItems.name: misp_api
configurationItems.description: MISP API key used for exporting this case to an event

configurationItems.name: universal_tag
configurationItems.description: (Optional) A custom tag to apply to every newly created event

name: Crowdstrike Falcon Custom IOC API
author: Michael
description: Submit observables to the Crowdstrike Falcon Custom IOC api

name: Mailer
author: CERT-BDF
description: Send an email with information from a TheHive case or alert

configurationItems.name: from
configurationItems.description: email address from which the mail is send

configurationItems.name: smtp_host
configurationItems.description: SMTP server used to send mail

name: Umbrella Blacklister
author: Kyle Parrish
description: Add domain to Umbrella blacklist via Enforcement API.
